In the year 2050, humanity is on the brink of extinction due to an unprecedented environmental disaster. * A 25-year-old scientist from 2050, struggling to comprehend the catastrophic consequences of her research.
* A 19th-century samurai warrior, seeking refuge from a war-torn Japan.
* A young girl from ancient Mesopotamia, fleeing persecution and slavery.
